snippet: Officer Ken Johnson was charged with murder and aggravated assault after he chased their car and opened fire, killing one and wounding another near Dallas.
abstract: Police Officer Ken Johnson of Farmers Branch, Tex, is arrested for murder in connection with fatal shooting of teenager Jose Cruz; Johnson claims he shot at Cruz and Edgar R Arevalo after chasing them for trying to break into his car.
lead_paragraph: Officer Ken Johnson was charged with murder and aggravated assault after he chased their car and opened fire, killing one and wounding another near Dallas.

headline.main: Texas Officer Charged With Murder in Shooting of Teenagers Suspected of Attempted Burglary
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Southwest; Texas: Officer Charged in Shooting Death of Teenager

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Johnson, Ken (Farmers Branch, Tex, Police Officer)
